msg: * Made the main page title for each screen  the same as (i.e. in sync with) the label of the node that is selected.

msg: Add getParent operation to various MBeans for Catalina tree hierarchy.

author: remm
msg: - Fix another deadlock occurring on shutdown. The synced section can be
smaller while still making sure the method is thread safe (bug 5747).
